value.title: sumNumbers
value.author: metarus208@gmail.com
value.instructions:
Given a string, return the sum of the numbers appearing in the string,
ignoring all other characters. A number is a series of 1 or more digit
`char`s in a row. (Note: `Character.isDigit(char)` tests if a `char` is
one of the `char`s '0', '1', .. '9'. `Integer.parseInt(string)` converts
a string to an `int`.)
